Class EletroSchyte

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class EletroSchyte
extends WeaponCard
    It represents the card ElectroSchyte it uses two method for the two alternative modality checkBasicMode() and checkReaper()
    Author:
    Karroot

      • checkAvailableMode

        public boolean[] checkAvailableMode()
                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Check which modes of the weapon can be used by player that has this weapon
        Specified by:
        checkAvailableMode in class WeaponCard
        Returns:
        array of booleans of size 2 the first represent the basic mode the second the alternative mode
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this card doesn't belong at a player

      • checkBasicMode

        public java.util.List<ColorId> checkBasicMode()
                                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Return the list of all target available for using the basic mode of this weapon
        Returns:
        all player that can be affected with the electroScythe in basic mode
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the basic mode can't be used
